name: Create a variable with undefined value
instruction:
A variable with the value `undefined` can be created without assigning any value to it.
Create a variable named `age` without assigning any value to it.
Create a variable named `typeOfAge` and assign it the value of the variable `age` type.

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what needs to be done,
but adapt it to the task requirements:
```javascript
let salary;
const typeOfSalary = typeof salary;
```
